azurerm_private_dns_cname_record.description: Manages a Private DNS CNAME Record.

name.description: The name of the DNS CNAME Record.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zone_name.description: Specifies the Private DNS Zone where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The Private DNS CNAME Record ID.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the DNS CNAME Record.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS CNAME Record.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS CNAME Record.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS CNAME Record.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS CNAME Record.
